Introduction
This topic contains information on removing dependents from current-law pension awards, including
removing a Veteran’s spouse due to
death, divorce, and annulment
physically living apart for reasons related to marital discord
, and
cessation of contributions
removing a child due to
death or marriage
, and
cessation of contributions
marriage of a school child
scheduling future dependency losses
, and
loss of a dependent
before the dependent is added to the award
, and
causes an increase rate of pension
.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section F - Dependents for Current-Law Pension Purposes
citation: Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section F
